mapper.select: SELECT provinceid,provincename FROM s_province ORDER BY provinceid ASC
SELECT cityid,cityname,provinceid FROM s_city WHERE provinceid = #{proid} ORDER BY cityid ASC
SELECT districtid,districtname,cityid FROM s_district WHERE cityid=#{cityid} ORDER BY districtid ASC

SELECT zdmc,zddh,province,pv.provincename,city,cityname,district,districtname,xxdz,zdjd,zdwd FROM wxzdcx wx LEFT JOIN s_province pv ON wx.province=pv.provinceid LEFT JOIN s_city sc ON wx.city=sc.cityid LEFT JOIN s_district sd ON sd.districtid=wx.district WHERE province=#{province} AND city=#{city} AND district=#{district}
